content.detailedDescription: Walked outside with my dogs and saw objects, knew it was not stars. no stars, sun, nor moon was in the sky. did not know what object was and got camera. only notices all the other objects, i.E., the multiple orbs and straight line of red and white lights on ground. telephone pole was barely seen to the left of each photo. this was not my first sighting, but first time i was able to get camera and take photos of the objects. i lost sight of the object(s) about 3 - 3 1/2 hours after i first noticed the objects.
content.summary: Went outside before sunrise & saw objects. additional objects showed up in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
Me,wife saw a big blue orb passing by  in nnw sky while we had our daily walk with our dog in a lit trail above m���l���y city.
i noticed it by chance. i guess the speed must have been  4-500 kn disappearing behind the mountains. the blue orb seemed very close,2-3 km,no sound heard, clear nite and no wind whatsoever. it was no plane but reminded me about a rocketflare light with no tale. it was so close it felt like i could reach out my hand and take it.

1. walking in a hike trail above the city of m���l���y.
2. i saw something in the corner of my eye.
3. a strange falling star with wrong colour and size and too low.
4. orb flyes by.
5. i shouted to my wife...What the hell is that? she saw it to but could not explain it after. it lasted only for a few seconds she said.
6. it went behind the mountain, since we were at the base of this.
content.summary: Big blue orb

content.detailedDescription:
At that time i had a bedroom window that faced east, on the second floor of house.  with a view over the roofs of the houses east of my location.  i entered that room with the lights off and it was dark outside.  a star, about 45 degrees up from the horizon caught my attention because it was bright and getting brighter.  i went to the window and cupped my hands around my face to block the reflections of light from the room.  i was riveted there as the "star" grew brighter and appeared to be approaching.  it came straight at me, terrifying me.  it stopped approaching when it reached a tall tree two houses over.  it appeared roughly cubic in shape but without sharp edges.  it reminded me of the glowing end of a cigarette ("cherry").  it hovered there over the tree for a moment and rotated slightly revealing that it was 3d.  then it moved over the house behind and then quickly came back toward me.  it passed my window and went around the corner of the house and out of sight.

about 10' diameter. slightly glowing mottled surface, cube shape but with soft edges.  reminiscent of a cigarette "cherry".  clear night.  note, i was a couple blocks from a swamp and undeveloped land.
content.summary: Bright star in east appeared to brighten, descended, hovered around tree, moved over house behind then toward me, then around corner and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Well like i said,we my little sister my sisther in law and my older brother,he tell me hey frank look at that,i was siting rear seat.
   we pull to the side of the road and park,got out to look at two shining
disks in aw....Down in a velley 500 yard infront of us one took off n.E.
fast...The second one came at us.21/2 hours went by and we where at the church parking lot.Lots to write need to tell best for me...Like i said too much to write...If you call me i can tell more.....In detail.
content.summary: Driving in a pinto and pull to tthe side of the road story too long sorry

content.detailedDescription:
I live on a farm in nd. no neighbors within 1/2 mile. absolutely now traffic of any kid on the nearest highway nd country rd. 200. 1/2 way from mayville and finley north dakota.

i went outside the front porch (east) at 2:am until 4:am with my 2 dogs and 2 cats for them to do their business. it's a ritual but i haven't gone out with them since last fall when it was above -20 below f. 

when i came the sky had clouded lightly but i could still see this moving star, the only one left in the sky.

there were a normal scattering of stars at first (2:am). looking due east, up about 40 degrees and about 25 degrees to the north there was an unusually bright start. the brightest in the sky.

i only had to look at it fir 1 second before it suddenly moved up,, the left, then down, then up, then right.  movements were sudden and fast bye  the entire time i watched it stayed in the same area, about the size of a dime. small yes, but at its' distance it looked about the same size as the space station and a bit brighter. at first i thought it may be one but it's movements were fast, abrupt and with no apparent logical purpose.

and, most impressive was it's speed.

feelings, reaction: i was elated that i finely saw what had to but a ufo. there is no way we can make something move so randomly and fast at what looked to be in the outer atmosphere.

never lost sight until the sky cloud over about 3:am.
content.summary: Bright star moving erratically in all direction but remained in orig area.

content.detailedDescription:
I was able to receive a copy of this event and this was recorded from a cell phone. if i have the information correct there were at least 10 observers at the walmart located at 441 & atlantic this particular night including a security guard. this recorded piece here was towards the end of its appearance in the sky at that time. i will try to submit a separate posting here as well so people can watch the video (tried submitting here in comments but appears to only take image files) and to encourage others who may be able to add additional info. there is also a very similar object (some call a light orb, also light orb ufo) that was posted from boynton beach around this date & you can easily find it on the map. i wonder if this was this same or a different object. there are also others who saw the same or different object near this date in coral springs and you can look on the map as well & see those submissions.

it appeared to have various colors that it emitted as a white-like ufo light orb- other colors were blueish, purple/violet & hues of green. it hovered for a good while and was around for about 15 minutes. it had a flickering appearance at one point.
content.summary: Orb light ufo hovering in sky for at least 15 minutes with mulitple witnesses at walmart on 3/10/14 at night

content.detailedDescription: Out of several events over many years, the one that bothers me to this day started out as an evening of spotlighting to count species of nocturnal creatures. my partner and i had just returned to our compound and were talking quietly. there was a little light coming in from the compound mercury vapor lights through the front of the building. all of a sudden there was light so bright we were blinded. all i can remember seeing was the inside of the building lit like the summer sun had been dropped in the room. there was no sound, but a low vibration was felt by both of us. this lasted a few minutes then the light just cut out, leaving us blind. all the lights in the compound are auto dusk till dawn and not only were they out but all the lights in an area spanning 3/4 of a mile had there sensors shut by the brightness. we heard no sounds of jets, helicopters or any thing that could have hovered over the compound. and seeing as a portion of the individuals are military pilots we would have known if it was a military aircraft flying over a closed space.
content.summary: Not one single event. many over a decade with multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
driving northwest on fm 2341 i observed large con trail.(wider and thicker than normal)  pulled off road to look at with 35mm binoculars. (30*46'42.70"n x 98*17'26.36"w ) was expecting a large b-52 multi-engine jet.  saw a long silver object flying in front of four to five smaller jets.  larger object was at least twice the size of the smaller jets. larger object appeared to be maneuvering, causing flashes of sunlight off its surface.  relatively straight flight pattern but appeared to be toying with chase planes.  large silver shiny object did not appear to have wings! (expected tanker to have large wings)  altitude was too great for good clear identification.  smaller jets appeared to be f-16s on afterburners. (single burners)  strangely, the chase planes were flying in a really tight formation for a chase? they were hard to identify as they were apparently in close formation with a lot of acrobatic maneuvering going on during this time. con trails on two of the smaller jets actually formed a corkscrew con trail.  first impression was that they were jockeying for better view of the larger silvery object.  they did not appear to be able to catch up with the larger object.  the larger object appeared to be lunging forward at times as if it slowed down to let the chase planes catch up.  all observation was through a 35mm lens and was extremely fuzzy due to extreme altitude. all objects were headed south to the gulf of mexico.  only military bases in that direction would be the electronic test range near big bend,texas. also navy bases at corpus christi, and kingsville.  i do not think it was a refueling operation as smaller jets appeared to be on afterburners!  activity was too close for refueling. i do not know what i saw!  was upset that i did not have better optics!  lost the flight as it crossed the sun to my south-southwest.  objects passed nearly directly overhead.
 about five to ten minutes later i saw another con trail headed in the same direction.  however, it turned out to be a southwest airlines jet (737) that was only about two thirds the altitude and less than half the speed.
     this report is not sufficient to stand alone, however, it might help if others reported this.  strange times we live in!
content.summary: Observed four or five smaller jets (f-16) chasing large silver object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside looking out as usual at night as it was quiet and i noticed some orange flickering lights near the palm trees, i got my binoculars and noticed more lights to the right and left of the one i first saw, to the north east traveling to the east, not high up but just above buildings

i first noticed the object because planes fly over my neighborhood and there was a bright orange stationary light over one of the houses then i noticed more like a fleet moving slowly east.

i thought it was a possible helicopter from afar but its orange glow made me second guess that first thought

there were multiple ones, some were stationary and not moving then i saw in the binoculars some moving to the left to the north but they mostly were moving to the right to the east, sometimes by themselves, sometimes in twos or threes, just slowly. they were not round and looked long. there were planes flying in their direction as well so maybe people on the planes saw them as well. it was just an odd scene.

i happen to see ufos often when i watch the night skies a lot, they don't alarm me but i wonder all the time if they are government craft because personally i see them at least a few times a month, rather small moving steady lights to the north or north east or strange colors like this one moving across over buildings.

i eventually went inside as i got tired of watching them, they were out there at least an hour as i kept going back to check where i saw them and it was really quiet out. because of the houses on my block to the east i couldn't see where they went after passing my line of sight but i saw where they appeared to originate from.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fleet of orange ones

content.detailedDescription: Driving through grants pass oregon we spotted several hovering orbs above the hills outside of town.  we pulled over and attempted to record objects with our phones.  during this time we spotted several objects in different directions from our location.  three objects hovered in a northernly directions, one to the northeast and approx 5-7 in the southwest.  they appeared to be silver in color and reflective.  they came in and out if visibility .  we attempted to film and captured some rough images.  we then drove across the street to the nearby goodwill store to get binoculars.  when we came back out with the binoculars the objects were gone.
content.summary: Several reflective orb like flying objects hovering and random movement.  visible then not with reflective characteristics

content.detailedDescription: Looked out window when i heard a loud helicopter not usually in the area. saw a bright small single light being followed by a helicopter. ran out the front door and called my wife to see it pass by the house and head directly towards the west coast. there was no sound from the light and the speed steady and constant. it wasn't going very fast. there were no flashing lights or colored lights. very strange.
content.summary: Heard a loud helicopter. looked out window and saw bright light being followed by helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
Why i cannot say for certain what i have seen was a ufo i can say that it was not fixed wing or a helicopter. ���it happened in 1974, 1975, 1976 or 1977, summertime, and in july or august. ���i was outside in the back yard at my parents home. ���it was pretty warm and i could not sleep in the house. ���i was laying on top of my sleeping bag, the air was warm, the sky was overcast and a ceiling of a thousand feet or so. ���i am guessing, at the time i flew small aircraft, but i knew about flying so i know about ceilings. ���suddenly an triangle shape flying craft came below the ceiling right above me. ���it seemed to hover, then moved slowly from my right to left or north to south. ���then suddenly it went very quickly to south and then vanished into clouds. ���the time was between 12:00 am and 1:00 am in the morning. ���after the experience i ran into the house and told everyone or woke up everyone and told my mom, dad and three sisters what i had seen. ���naturally everyone was not convinced or impressed by what i had seen. i was told to go back to bed, which i did. ���i went back and outside and fell asleep. ���sometime later i awoke again, much to my surprise there were approximately 20 or 25 cats in a perfect circle surrounding me and my sleeping bag. ���the cats were sitting upright and looking intently at me. ���i reached to one of the cats and then they all came close to me and were purring loudly. ���they were friendly and loving, typical cat behavior for a cat that is a pet. ���i did not recognize one of the cats but i did not feel frightened. ���after my encounter with cats the i must have fallen to sleep. ���next morning when i awoke there were no cats sleeping by me. ���while i do not remember the exact times or date i will never forget this experience. ���i do not know what it all means and i am certain that this type of experience has never happened again. ���i am not a scientist or have a top secret experience but i know what i saw. ���at that time my parents lived in caldwell, idaho. ���

i watch the show on h2; i prompted to say something. ���what i do not know is why did this event happen and are the cats somehow connected? ���was the event a completely random event? ���i do not have any bad feelings or fears from the experience but i do not understand it. ��� ���
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Outside, summer, laying, overhead object, many colors, triangle, i sleep, wake, surrounded by cats.

content.detailedDescription:
We moved to union maine when i was in 3rd grade (about 1981). on may or june of each year i would be awoken by lights in the field that i could see by my window.  i did see greys several times as i used binocs to look at the craft landing site. about 8 years later, i remember walking into the field and returned to my room not by myself.  i bieleve now that  i was being abducted.  when i was about 10 yrs old a mark that resembles a birth mark appeared on my right hand between my pointing and middle finger in the shape of a triangle.  it hasn't always been there, i was told if i have it removed i will be marked with something else. all i remember from that abduction was being scared.  and i am very sorry but i don't remember all of them.  

when i was about 8yrs old, i didn't see the craft that year.  instead i was walking in the field with the dogs, the field was going to be mowed for hay in two days so i wanted to walk through the field one last time.. this time was weird.  in the middle of the field the furture hay was laying down in a circler motion, i had no idea what had happened but there was several little places connecting to the big circle.. when my parent got home i took him to that spot to show him what i found.. he got very anxious.  we went bad to the house and he climbed on the roof to see the 'circles' from up high..  he came down and said come with me, we went to the barn got a couple of brooms, we went back to the field and stood the grass back up.. it was totally amazing to find the grass intact!!! the stock was not broken, it was whole.  after we stood it up, he mowed it, that day.  several days after my mother was going to the store, being a typical kid i begged her to let me stay home alone.. she finally gave in with stipulations.. ya know don't do this, don't touch that etc.  5 to 10 minutes after she left a car pulled into our driveway..  

now union is in the country, we lived up on a dirt road in the middle of nowhere...  this car was black.  black wheels, black windows, black everything and no plate.  the people were also dressed in black.  i knew wasy of leaving the house without anyone hearing me and that is what i did. these men walked to the exact place where that crop circle was, they took samples of the earth and the grass around it, walked back to their car and left.  to this day if i write or talk about it i get painful goosebumps.  men in black??? 
 as far as what it looked like... 
it looked like a disk, with red,blue,green,white,orange colored lights moving in patterns.  it was always the same type of craft. when i think about it i get deep painful goosebumps.  and really freaks me out!   

i don't really remember much about being abducted thankfully.  i kinda remember them being nice to me at first then being more forsful as i got older.  and my reactions now... scared...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Whitnessed several over many years in the same place.  and i beielve its why i am infertile

content.detailedDescription: At age 12 or13 my friend and my self snuck to lake to fish all was fine we saw a strange light in on or under water the next thing we new 2 or more hours had passed and we were down the canal from our bikes and fishing gear cold and con fused and had false memory of helicopter we are still friends to this day however we never spoke of that night for 40 years until a couple years ago and realized we never saw a helicopter we bough have scoop mark scars with no reason for them. was this a uso that took us i have other memories through out my life
content.summary: Went to the lake to fish saw light in on or of water lost time2or more hours became aware agin at different place on same pier

content.detailedDescription: I was spying on my girlfriend something appears on bed with my girlfriend it never enyetd the room it just appears in our bed covered her up with a three finger hand and fis something to her for a few min.I think it was talking something from her womb. i got it  on vidio i really want my gov . to see it  i suspect she is being abused on a regular basic .We also had a proplem of her missing large amounts of blood with no bleeding problems again i must remain anoumus at all cost but some body must do something about what is going on in our bedrooms
content.summary: Have vidio of something that appeared in bed with girlfriend i must remain anonamous

content.detailedDescription:
Well i feel kind of crazy for doing this but doctors couldn't tell us what happened.
i was at home with my parents when i was 7, my dad found me laying down with foam in my mouth so they called the ambulance. i was asleep for 7 days and doctors said it wasn't quite a coma. they told my parents that i had not suffered a stroke or heart attack. they said that i was most likely not going to make it. well my parents told me i woke up 7 days after my accident or whatever it was. i woke up healthy. i remember having a little trouble walking when i woke up. also i had scars on the right side of my body and a big bubble as if i had got a real bad burn on my right foot. the bubble scarred and i have a circle scar now which again baffled the doctors. the following weeks i remember getting tests done in just about everything and they couldn't tell my parents what it was. my parents and i have never got a cause. i'm 23 now and i'm as healthy as anybody else. i've always been kind of not really a believer in the whole alien thing. but a coworker of mine is a die hard alien believer and after telling him my experience he said that he's sure it was some sort of alien experiment on me lol. he said that's why i'm so into astronomy and that's why i always have dreams about flying.
i would just like to know if i'm dumb for sharing this story or if there's other cases similar to mine. i've always wanted to know why i almost died that time, and i've never got an answer. i can provide pictures of my scars. again i'm not crazy and i am kind of embarrassed of being laughed at but just wondering if somehow i can hear a theory of what happened to me, maybe it was just an unusual heart attack or something.
content.summary: No ufo. i was 7 yrs old went into a coma woke up 7 days later with marks on my body. drs never gave explanation

content.detailedDescription: I was on the phone talking to my aunt looking north out  the back door then out of no where this  thing hovering over  a house for about  5 min. at tree top high then slowly move behind the school, i told my aunt i got to go hung up the phone and ran to the school  as  i got to the school and was going to the back where the play ground and the baseball fields was , i got this feeling to stop not to go around the corner  of the school i froze there seams like  forever but back away.
content.summary: Hover a house tree top high then went behind the school

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:50 am on 2.2
17.2014, my wife witnessed then photographed an object above the city of goodyear arizona, maricopa county.  the craft pulsed from white to silver and appeared to drift from north to east.  the craft has no wings, no empennage nor any heat signature.  i looked at the photo and it does not appear to be a balloon.  also the sun was coming up in the east and the craft was changing colors on the west side so sun reflection was not possible.
content.summary: At 6:50 am 2.17.20114 my wife photographed this craft.  no heat signature, odd shape for flighjt!

content.detailedDescription:
March 14,2014 8pm.I was driving north on meridian rd to sr10 alone.I was adoring the sky to the nw when i saw a strange site.It was an orange/yellow glowing light aprox over us41 around lowell,in (10mi away).It was way lower than any plane in the sky and hovered with no identifying lights.I pulled over and went to grab my phone to film it.As i looked up,it turned suddenly toward the ne and zoomed off.I called my husband at home to tell him what i had seen.I was excited.

march 14,2014 10:40pm.I was driving north on hwy65 toward sr10 with 4 pre teen passengers.As we passed the fair oaks exit i started to tell them what i had saw earlier.I pointed up at the clear,starlit sky at yet another orange/yellow light and said "it looked like that".At that exact moment the light that was hovering in the nw sky darted east sparling,then descended leaving orange/red sparks behind it as it disappeared just above tree level.I was again excited that i was able to show someone that i was not crazy...That i did see something.The kids were ducking down in their seats screaming,yelling,laughing in disbelief.The rest of the way home our eyes were glued to the skies.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Twice in 3hrs i saw orange/yellow lights in 2 seperate areas.The last sighting hovered,sparkled and desinigrated

content.detailedDescription: A couple of years ago i had major neck surgery (i had two discs replaced and my spinal cord repaired)i didnt sleep well at all anywhere from 30 minutes to 2 hours at a time during the night. when i would wake up, i would go out in my back yard and soak in my hoot tub. i would do this 3 or 4 times a night. i always look up in the sky and this night was no different. so i'm sitting in the tub facing north, and all of a sudden i see what seemed to be at the edge of our atmosphere a sequence of 5 light rings, one after the other coming in at a 30 degree angle, blinking from largest to smallest, pop,pop,pop and so on until the last one, and then the craft seemed to power down and head back in the same direction except that it flew at a horizontal flight path.I only saw it a very short time before it disapeared.I found this fasinating.It was pretty exciting. i have never seen anything like this. i have no idea of what i saw and this is why i have come to mufon.
content.summary: 5 hoola hoop shaped light  rings seeming to enter atmosphere at 30 degree anglel sequentialy each getting smaller than the last then "powering down" and changing direction going back  to nw only at horizontal direction

content.detailedDescription: Saw 3 bright lights to the north, that lasted about 30 sec. then gave off a bright flash of light and was gone. located a few miles north west of travis afb.
content.summary: Bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading east north east on highway 67 in oaklandon, i had just left a restaurant after celebrating my godfather's birthday. the road curves north for a brief moment, and i noticed three really bright lights in a triangular pattern to my north east. i thought, "it's just a plane, but that's really low." i start looking at it more and more as i got closer, and as the road bends back to the north east, i was able to see several more, smaller lights (but not of any color, and no red or green light signaling any sort of wing) around the three large lights, which i could then tell were pulsating. i couldn't make out any sort of lines that would give off the shape of the object. i came to the stoplight between mccordsville and oaklandon (it was red), so i turned the heater and radio off and rolled down my window to see if i could hear anything. by this point, the object was slightly behind and to the left of me. it couldn't have been more than a few hundred feet away from me, but it was absolutely silent. i know planes do not hover, and i know helicopters are audible from the distance i was from this object.
content.summary: Very large craft hovering over a field as i was driving by

content.detailedDescription:
I was out taking a walk on a gorgeous sunny day in early september 2009 and stopped to talk with a friend.  i happened to glance upward and saw something funny - an large airliner without wings, way too narrow for a blimp, and silver in color.  i kept looking up trying to see wings, and finally interrupted my friend and asked her, "what do you think that is?"  "hmmm.  i don't know."  then we resumed our conversation.  at the time of the event, i didn't give much credence to ufo talk and forgot about the whole thing.  i doubt if my friend would remember this but i mean to ask her next time i see her.

then, a few months ago, i started reading some high quality books on the subject, and when i read that many witnesses don't remember the exact date and time of their sighting, this memory was dislodged.  i couldn't stop thinking about it.  i guess you can say i am not so skeptical anymore. today, i read a mufon report about a cylinder sighting five days earlier here in california, so now i'm even less skeptical! 

by the way, i know the date because i see this friend only rarely, and wrote her name on my calendar that day.
content.summary: Long wing-less cylinder glistening in the sun while flying high overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was out in late afternoon taking a picture of venus when a airplane flew overhead in my pictures. i was so distracted i followed the airplane.
content.summary: Taking picture of venus and plane flew overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling in my car with a group of friends up through the milton of campsie in the uk.
the road is like a long back road (b822 crow road)
it was getting dark when i myself felt like the engine was dying on me in my car, then there was a flashing white/blue light which seemed to be right above us and car wouldnt start.  
my friends in the car asked me to stop carrying on but it wouldnt start and kept telling them it isnt me its outside.
none of us got out and looked as we just looked out the windows of the car to see if we spotted anything above us but couldnt see anything.
there was no with no mobile/cell phone coverage or radio.

there was no noise like an airplane or helicopter would make just silence.
this light flashed for a few mins then was gone and car started again after a few tries, there was no fading of the light when it went away just steady blink/glow then was pitch black again.

we travelled to a place called the clachan hotel just to calm our nerves and asked the manager at the time if there was a flight path in the location it happened and he said no.  there are no airplanes on that stretch of land only into the town as you can see them flying through the day at the bottom of the hill (car park) but no where near it happened with us.

it happened, i was say 4-5 mins which felt longer when we talked about it to the manager and thinking about it.

the following day my friend in banknock, bonnybridge (near falkirk in the uk)says he seen something similar to what we noticed and said it didnt make a noise but what he described was a disc shape which there was no lights coming from it and no sound but like a plane slowly moving but low then stopped and a blue/white light appeared from it then it was gone, no noise just vanished from the area.

not sure if he was making it up but he told me this before i spoke to him what i had seen and going what he stated the 2 seem to be the same.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Estaba con mi tio yendo por la carretera, y decidimos parar el veh���culo y sacar una foto al mar caribe, al parar y al mi tio sacar la foto se dio cuenta inmediatamente de que habia un objeto raro a lo lejoz, inmediatamente miramos al cielo y este objeto ya habia desaparecido,(todo paso muy rapido) debia de estar moviendose a una gran velocidad para desde lejoz verse borroso,por estas razones dudo de que haya sido un avion, tambien deja un rastro como  si fuera particulas de alg���n tipo,a los pocos dias mandamos la foto a discovery channel,pero no tuvimos ninguna respuesta.
quiero saber si se puede explicar racionalmente. gracias
content.summary: Ufo en el malecon santo domingo

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to school with my mother and younger sister in april of '99 when we came to the stop sign at the end of our neighborhood road. i noticed in the east at about 35-40 degrees, an extremely bright star was pulsating. i pointed this out to my mother and sister and we watched for approximately 30 seconds. (the "star" i'm referring to is always in the sky in the spring and fall. it is brightly lit and stays visible long after the sun washes out the night sky). then, randomly another light dropped down from the original and stood stationary for a second. the second light from our viewpoint, circled the first with great speed 3 times then immediately zoomed over head of some power lines to the right of the vehicle. i felt a sudden panic and then calmness washed over me. the panic i felt seemed to disappear and if i had a camera at the time, i wouldn't of been able to photograph it. we all in a stupor observed a black triangle at about 300ft in the air, sit stationary without making a noise. there were 4 lights on the bottom of the craft. three pulsating, color changing lights on each corner of the triangle and one red light in the center. the corner lights changed from red to orange to yellow and back repeatedly for about 3 minutes. as the sun was rising, we all had a very good daytime view of the object. then it accelerated to a ridiculous amount of speed very, very quickly out to the west. the object did not change direction from its origin to its leaving. this event especially had an impact on me. i have been fearful of things i could not logically make sense of. i am not superstitious, religious, spiritual, or mentally ill in anyway. although this day has given me countless nightmares and obviously had a psycological impact on me. i had an immense feeling that this craft knew we were watching it. i can remember looking at my mother and sister staring at it frozen, unable to move although i could. as if time had stopped for a second and then seemingly fast forwarded back. this happened for a good thirty seconds. my mother has seen "ufo"s before in close proximity so she says. i have no choice but to believe this craft had a consciousness to it and was not built by humans as there is no logical way occupants could survive the maneuvers i witnessed. my research has shown based on the descriptions, the belgian triangle ufo's are the same craft. as well as numerous reports around the u.S. in the mid to late 90's.
content.summary: Daytime black triangle three witness with psychological imprint on one

content.detailedDescription:
This was in the late 1960s (approx. 1968-69), and i was 9-10 years old, walking to or from school with 2 friends in the daytime.

we heard aircraft noise and looked up. moving from our right to our left were 1 round (silent), white glowing orb, followed closely by 2 military jets.

about 5-10 minutes later the 3 objects came back in the opposite direction.

on both occasions, the flight speed was relatively slow, and the flight altitude was low. if i had to guess, the speed was 200 mpg at 1,500 ft.

the 2 military jets followed about 1 or 2 lengths behind the orb on both occasions, flying side-by-side with each other.

the orb was not small. i'd estimate that the radius was just below the width of the jets' wingspan. i could tell because the 3 objects were close to each other.

i'd compare the glow effect of the orb to using a flashlight on the ceiling of a room - but in the daytime.

the area was flat, no hills. we watched both occasions until they flew out of sight.

i don't recall if we made a big deal about it with our families. i think in those days, there were a lot of sightings. we were kids, but not really scared. it was more the feeling of awe, especially since 2 fighter jets trailed it tightly. chula vista is a suburb of san diego, and was full of military.

sorry, i have no proof. perhaps there are similar sighting records for this time and place. i thought i should finally make a report since the sighting involved 2 military jets tailing it closely.

the sighting never bothered me. i never had nightmares, and in fact forgot about it for years. now that media programs have brought it front and center, i can tell my story. when i hear about other sightings, i am open-minded and believe these ufos exist because of my sighting.

thank you for allowing me to file this report and for providing this service. i will be happy to contribute too!
content.summary: Late 1960s daytime, saw round light followed by 2 airforce jets. all 3 came back the opposite direct minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: Was travel king north on cty hwy k and saw it hovering over a commercial farm so i pulled over and it wiped off to the horizon and then came back right over head and then ziped back to the horizon all the wile i was takeing pics with my phone
content.summary: Was over head then a mile away than came back super sonic speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside at approximately 11:15 pm south of boston. i caught something bright streaking across the sky like a shooting star, but when i looked it was much larger than a star appears and it was much closer. it fell rapidly, unmistakably toward the earth, broke into several pieces and disintegrated within a few seconds. as far as i could tell it never hit the ground. i believe i may have seen the same object that was reported as case #54969 (from jefferson, me).
content.summary: Large fireball fell rapidly from the sky, broke into several pieces & quickly disintegrated before it could hit the ground.
